attributes.action: not permit the killing of badgers in a misguided and damaging policy to control bovine TB
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Permitting badger killing to control bovine TB would be a policy error of huge proportions.
It is not based on the scientific analysis of the government's own specialists and would be hugely counter-productive.
We call on the Prime Minister to ignore the pro culling elements in the farming community, who are using badgers as a scapegoat to deflect attention from issues in their own industry and to support the overwhelming majority of the public who are against any cull of these wonderful animals.
